title: Blambot
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224643/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224643/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Blambot**

Online foundry specializing in fonts for comics designed by [Nate Piekos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224643/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Nate%20Piekos). This website offers high quality _Pro_ fonts and some very impressive [freeware](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224643/http:/typophile.com/wiki/freeware) fonts.

website: [www.blambot.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224643/http:/www.blambot.com/ "www.blambot.com")
author: paul d hunt
